subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Andretti family has won just once at the Indianapolis 500, but Marco Andretti, one of the few American contenders in the field, will try again on Sunday.
snippet: The Andretti family has won just once at the Indianapolis 500, but Marco Andretti, one of the few American contenders in the field, will try again on Sunday.
